name: StaphylococcusAureusTestsForStaphAureusNucleicAcidInBlood
title: Staphylococcus aureus (Tests for Staph aureus Nucleic Acid in Blood)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of  Staphylococcus aureus nucleic acid in blood),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Staphylococcus aureus nucleic acid in blood),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
